pr_title: DB-9853 Low watermark for transactions should never be MAX_VALUE

timeline.message: DB-9853 Low watermark for transactions should never be MAX_VALUE

timeline.bodyText: fetchTimestamp can never bee Long.MAX_VALUE? Or do we assume then we can't fix this here anyhow?
timeline.author: martinrupp

replies.bodyText: I don't think that fetchTimestamp can ever reach MAX_VALUE, otherwise, our monotonically increasing timestamp would be broken. @dgomezferro, do you agree?
replies.author: arnaud-splice
